user_request: Empty the shopping cart on newegg.com. Add logitech g pro to the cart on newegg.com, then select checkout.
last_action: click on the trash bin icon (means a delete icon) located at the middle-left side of the screen.
reflect_result: By clicking on the trash bin icon, the laptop previously in the cart has been removed, which is a step towards emptying the shopping cart as requested. This action eliminates the item from the cart, fulfilling part of the user's request to clear it. However, this does not yet complete the request fully, as the user also asked to add a specific item (Logitech G Pro) to the cart and proceed to checkout. Therefore, progress has been made toward the overall goal, but additional actions are needed to add the desired item and proceed to checkout.
